alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 6:07PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Saguache County through 630 PM MDT... At 607 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Moffat, or 15 miles southwest of Hayden Pass Burn Scar, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Saguache County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft
